item.title: From trendy jumpsuits to evening gowns: Top 6 upcoming fashion trends for 2023

item.title: Valentine's Day 2023: Rajkummar Rao says 'Har baar bas tum hi milna' to Patralekhaa in note: From 2010 to infinity...'
item.description: Rajkummar Rao celebrated Valentine's Day by writing a sweet, romantic note for his wife, Patralekhaa, and asked her, "Har baar bas tum milna." He also shared a collage of their wedding photo and another of when they were in a relationship. See Rajkummar's post inside.

item.title: Valentine's Day 2023: Kareena Kapoor says 'Main apni favourite hoon', Malaika Arora gets her 'Valentine colours on'
item.description: Valentine's Day 2023: Kareena Kapoor and Malaika Arora gave their Valentine's Day celebrations a quirky twist by dropping their fashionable looks. While Kareena, in a sequinned saree, wrote 'Main apni favourite hoon', Malaika got her 'Valentine colours on' in a red jumpsuit.

item.title: Ayurvedic rules to exercise: Best time for workout, ideal duration, when to stop

item.title: Gluten-free flour made from sweet potatoes is high in antioxidants and ideal for baking: Study
item.description: A recent study published in ACS Food Science & Technology revealed the optimal method for converting sweet potatoes into gluten-free flours high in antioxidants and ideal for thickening or baking.

item.title: Male infertility: Diagnosis and treatments for men to cure low sperm count

item.title: Paxlovid reduced hospitalisation, death risk during Omicron wave: Study
item.description: Antiviral drug, paxlovid, significantly reduced the likelihood of hospitalisation or death from COVID-19 in people at risk of severe illness during the Omicron wave, according to a study.

item.title: International Condom Day: A brief history of rubbers
item.description: Condoms are pretty great, preventing both diseases and unwanted pregnancies. They were first used in 3000 BC. Ancient Egyptians color-coded theirs while the Romans supposedly made them from the muscles of fallen enemies.

item.title: Is Valentine's Day bad for your mental health? Here's what a psychologist says
item.description: Psychologist Mehezabin Dordi says Valentine's Day may be troublesome for some people's mental health irrespective of whether they are single or not.

item.title: Diabetes: 5 important nutrients that can lower diabetes risk

item.title: Mucosal vaccines for respiratory viruses are difficult to develop: Study
item.description: Vaccines that provide long-lasting protection against influenza, coronaviruses and respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) are difficult to develop. New study, explore the challenges and outline approaches to improved vaccines.

item.title: Valentine's Day 2023: Why do we celebrate Valentine's Day on February 14? Know history and significance of day of love
item.description: Happy Valentine's Day 2023: Valentine's Day annually falls on February 14, and people celebrate the day of love with much fervour. Here's all you need to know about the history, significance, why we celebrate the day on February 14, and some interesting facts about the season of Cupid.

item.title: How to celebrate your first Valentine's Day as parents

Here are some great ways to show your love and appreciation for your partner and celebrate Valentine's Day as parents.

item.title: Anti-Valentine's Week 2023 Full List: Slap Day, Kick Day to Breakup Day, find out all about days after Valentine's Week
item.description: Anti-Valentine's Week 2023 Full Calendar: After Valentine's Day (February 14), people celebrate Anti-Valentine's Week from February 15. The days are called Slap Day, Kick Day, Perfume Day, Flirt Day, Confession Day, Missing Day, and Breakup Day. Read about the significance and correct dates inside.

item.description: The myths around protein supplements can lead to confusion and misinformed decisions about their use. To help clear the air, in this article, we will separate fact from fiction and discuss the myths and realities surrounding protein supplements.

item.title: India opens first stage of New Delhi-Vadodara-Mumbai Expressway
item.description: India's ambitious $13 billion project of Delhi-Mumbai Expressway will eventually cut the road travel time between the country's two biggest cities in half, to 12 hours.

item.title: Ladakh to host India's first frozen-lake marathon ‘Last Run’ at Pangong Tso
item.description: Ladakh's 21km marathon, with Lukung as its starting point, will end at Maan village. 75 selected athletes from India and abroad are participating in the run, giving them an opportunity to make a bid for a Guinness world record for the world's highest frozen-lake marathon

item.title: Respiratory failure: Causes, risk factors, symptoms, complications, treatment
item.description: Respiratory failure happens when the lungs are not able to receive enough oxygen into the blood. Here's all you need to know about the causes, risk factors, symptoms, complications and treatment of respiratory failure
